question: [File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: BurnTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Burn-Mint Symmetry] Do BurnTranslator and MintTranslator use identical logic for FixedSupply vs UnlimitedSupply detection, or can asymmetries cause burn events to use different keys than corresponding mint events? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: BurnTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Double Burn Protection] Can an attacker emit multiple Burn events for the same token in the same transaction, and does the sequence number logic prevent duplicate burn event recording? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: BurnTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Burn Index Dereferencing] Does *burn.index() properly dereference the index value, or can pointer arithmetic issues cause wrong index values in BurnEvent? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDepositTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [TokenStore Not Found Semantics] When TokenStore resource is not found, does this mean the account never held tokens or the resource was deleted, and can attackers exploit this ambiguity to create fake deposit events? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDepositTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Token ID Cloning Attack] Can an attacker provide a malicious TokenId in deposit.id() that references a different token than actually deposited, creating false ownership records? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDepositTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Amount Zero Deposit] Does the translator reject deposits with amount = 0, or can attackers spam zero-amount deposits to pollute event logs and waste indexer resources? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenWithdrawTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Withdraw Without Deposit] Can the sequence number logic ensure withdraws only occur after corresponding deposits, or can attackers create withdraw events that appear to extract tokens from empty accounts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenWithdrawTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Over-withdrawal Detection] Does the translator track balances to prevent recording withdraw events that exceed the deposited amount for a given TokenId? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: BurnTokenTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Burn Without Ownership] Can an attacker emit BurnToken events for tokens they don't own, and does the translator verify token ownership before recording burn events? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: BurnTokenTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Partial Burn Tracking] Does the translator correctly handle partial burns (amount < total balance), or can rounding errors cause incorrect burn event amounts? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: MutatePropertyMapTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Property Key-Value-Type Length Mismatch] If mutate.keys(), mutate.values(), and mutate.types() have different lengths, can this cause index out-of-bounds or corrupt property map serialization? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: MutatePropertyMapTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Old ID vs New ID] Can an attacker provide identical old_id and new_id to create no-op mutation events, or different IDs to fake token ID changes without actual transfer? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: MutatePropertyMapTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Type String Parsing] Are the type strings in mutate.types() validated before cloning, or can malicious type strings exploit parsers downstream? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: MintTokenTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Collections Resource Confusion] Does the translator ensure the Collections resource belongs to the actual creator and not a spoofed address that happens to have a Collections resource? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: MintTokenTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Mint Token ID Validation] Can an attacker provide a pre-existing token ID in mint.id() to create duplicate mint events for already-minted tokens? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: CreateCollectionTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Maximum Supply Bypass] Can an attacker set create.maximum() to u64::MAX or 0 to bypass supply limits, and does the translator validate this value? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: CreateCollectionTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [URI Injection] Can malicious URLs in create.uri() exploit parsers or indexers that process collection metadata, enabling phishing or XSS attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: CreateCollectionTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Collection Name Collision] Does the translator check for existing collections with the same name under the same creator, or can duplicate CreateCollectionEvents be recorded? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDataCreationTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Royalty Denominator Zero] Can create.royalty_points_denominator() be zero, causing division-by-zero when calculating royalty percentages downstream in indexers or UIs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDataCreationTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Royalty Numerator > Denominator] Can royalty_points_numerator > royalty_points_denominator, creating royalties > 100% that drain more funds than the sale price? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDataCreationTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Property Array Length Mismatch] If property_keys, property_values, and property_types have mismatched lengths, can this corrupt token metadata in the CreateTokenDataEvent? (High)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: TokenDataCreationTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Mutability Config Bitfield] Can an attacker set invalid bits in mutability_config that enable unauthorized mutations, and does the translator validate this bitfield? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: OfferTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Offer to Self] Can an attacker create Offer events where to_address == offer.account(), creating fake offer activity without actual token transfer risk? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: OfferTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [PendingClaims Resource Race] If PendingClaims resource is deleted between event emission and translation, does the error handling prevent other events in the transaction from being indexed? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/storage/indexer/src/event_v2_translator.rs] [Function: OfferTranslator::translate_event_v2_to_v1()] [Amount Overflow] Can offer.amount() overflow internal accounting in indexers tracking pending offers, enabling double-claim attacks? (High)
